name: "Prick Up Your Ears" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who breaks the window of the adult video store?
questions.explanation:
Adam West.

	In the beginning of this episode, Adam West has his pizza delivered to his home.  Angry because his pizza was topped with Canadian bacon, Mayor West gets out his 'cat launcher' and chases the delivery boy through Quahog's streets shooting cats at him.  One cat (named Paul) goes through the window as Chris and his friends go by.  They end up stealing armfuls of adult videos while they can.

questions.text: Peter once taught a money management course for what type of people?
questions.explanation:
Drug addicts.

	Chris and his friends take the videos back to the Griffin house to watch them, but Lois catches them watching one in Chris' room.  When Chris tells Lois that the school's sexual education teacher was cut for money, Lois decides to teach the class herself.  Peter comments that he once taught money management for drug addicts at this time.  One method he created was to reuse and share needles to make it big.

questions.text: What does Stewie crack his tooth on?
questions.explanation:
A small toy piece.

	While playing with a toy, Stewie finds a small piece which he assumes was placed there to be eaten.  When he bites into it, he loses a tooth and Brian and Chris tell him to leave it under the pillow for the tooth fairy.  Brian also ends up scaring Stewie into thinking that the tooth fairy is bad, and Stewie finds himself as hopeless as Liam Neeson playing the role of an American cowboy.

questions.text: What gemstone is associated with the 'crusade' that Meg joins?
questions.explanation:
Opal.

	After talking about condoms in front of schoolchildren (as per her job), Lois is fired from the position and the school principal decides to bring in a priest from the Evangelical Church to teach the kids about sex.  The priest introduces the Opal Ring Crusade, which requires that all members wear opal rings as a symbol of their abstinence.

questions.text: What is the name of the boy that Meg dates in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Doug.

	At the Opal Ring Crusade's first assembly, Meg notices Doug, the boy next to her, answering questions correctly and the two get together.  Meanwhile, Stewie tries to trick the tooth fairy, but when he realizes that his tooth has been stolen from underneath his pillow, he comments that the Tooth Fairy is quieter than Britney Spears' dietitian.  Meanwhile, Brian dances around a sombrero due to a "Family Guy" text message survey.

questions.text: To trick the Tooth Fairy, Stewie steals a set of dentures.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Stewie decides to confront the thief who steals from under his pillow by sneaking into Herbert's house and stealing his dentures for use in the evil ploy.  Meanwhile, Lois tries to make love to Peter, but Meg has already convinced him to switch to abstinence so that nothing bad can happen to him.  When Lois tries to talk to Meg about it, she finds her in her room with Doug; both of them having 'aural sex' with each other in the latest fad.

questions.text: What medical condition does Jillian have?
questions.explanation:
Bulimia.

	After bringing up the Tooth Fairy topic with Brian, Brian notes that his girlfriend, Jillian, is bulimic, and it helps her look good despite her little intellect.  Stewie takes Jillian out for dinner and says comments that force her to go throw up in the bathroom.  Because of her condition, Jillian is prone to losing teeth and hair, so Stewie helps himself to free teeth for his plan.

questions.text: Where does Lois have a tattoo?
questions.explanation:
Her lower back.

	In order to help Meg, Lois once again tries to talk to her about the dangers of 'aural sex' and the consequences as opposed to feeling right about abstinence and letting herself love when she is ready.  Meg notes that Lois is more convincing than Mel Gibson after apologizing to the Jewish population after his DUI.  Lois also brings up her tattoo, which she got while she was on crystal meth.

questions.text: In the end, Stewie outwits the Tooth Fairy.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In the end, Brian reveals that there is no Tooth Fairy, it's just another myth that he used to play against Stewie.  When they later check Jillian's tooth under Stewie's pillow, it's gone.  Elsewhere, the Tooth Fairy returns to his apartment and adds the tooth to a growing pile of missing teeth.  He jumps into them in ecstasy.

questions.text: How do Lois and Peter get into the school without being noticed?
questions.correct: They sneak in behind a man wearing an overcoat
options: They dress up as construction workers
Peter runs through the halls naked as a distraction
questions.explanation:
They sneak in behind a man wearing an overcoat.

	In order to stop the madness of 'aural sex', Lois forces Peter to return to his normal self and they head to the high school.  Lois interrupts the Opal Ring Crusade assembly and tells the kids to go at their own pace and let nature take its course.  Doug and Meg decide to give up abstinence, but Doug dumps Meg after he realizes that he would need to see her naked.  In another "Family Guy" text message vote, Cleveland makes an impromptu appearance at the end of the episode after all plots are resolved.
